title: New free champion rotation: Rek'Sai, Fizz, Varus and more!

replies.body: What about the other champs who actually use shields?  {{champion:89}} {{champion:80}}??

really? Fizz has an awful laning phase if you're competent, fiora can be annoying but is stoppable easily, Darius you just have to juke out his Qs, yi is a pub stomper who is super easily stopped, and draven is just kinda annoying. if this is really so bad, than get better at league.
Get better at league said everybody ever. Doesn't stop us from disliking some champs though.
